name: part_004
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】Revival ⧸ 重大告知あり！【#角巻わため生誕祭2024】 [fcFwvfav6mQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Kochira, Koufuku Anshin Iinkai desu' (This is the Happiness and Peace of Mind Committee).
Screen glitches into a black scene before transitioning to the next part of the live.

subtitles.original: こちら、幸福安心委員会です。
subtitles.english: This is the Happiness and Peace of Mind Committee.

subtitles.original: 作詞：鳥居羊　作曲：うたたP
subtitles.english: Lyrics: Torii Hitsuji, Composition: UtataP

subtitles.original: どうして　みんなが幸せなの？
subtitles.english: Why is everyone so happy?

subtitles.original: この世界のことが
subtitles.english: About this world

subtitles.original: 聞きたいって
subtitles.english: They say they want to hear

subtitles.original: 知りたいって
subtitles.english: They say they want to know

subtitles.original: 水辺の公園で
subtitles.english: In the park by the water

subtitles.original: みんなが耳をすませて
subtitles.english: Everyone listens closely

subtitles.original: ワクワクするね
subtitles.english: It's exciting, isn't it?

subtitles.original: ええ、オンディーヌの
subtitles.english: Yes, Undine's...

subtitles.original: ワクワクするね
subtitles.english: It's exciting, isn't it?

subtitles.original: Ａ Ｏ Ｎ Ｄ Ｉ Ｉ Ｎ Ｏ
subtitles.english: A O N D I I N O

subtitles.original: ハイハイ！
subtitles.english: High, high!

subtitles.original: さぁさぁ皆さん　教えてあげます
subtitles.english: Come now, everyone, I'll tell you

subtitles.original: みんなが気になってること　疑問に思ってること
subtitles.english: The things you're curious about, the things you're wondering

subtitles.original: 全部　教えてあげます
subtitles.english: I'll tell you everything

subtitles.original: ええ、皆さんが幸福なのは義務なんです
subtitles.english: Yes, it's your duty to be happy

subtitles.original: 幸せですか？
subtitles.english: Are you happy?

subtitles.original: 義務ですよ、果たしてますか？
subtitles.english: It's a duty, are you fulfilling it?

subtitles.original: 我々幸福安心委員会は
subtitles.english: We, the Happiness and Peace of Mind Committee

subtitles.original: 皆様の幸せを願い、そして支えます
subtitles.english: Wish for and support everyone's happiness

subtitles.original: 幸福なのは義務なんです
subtitles.english: It's a duty to be happy

subtitles.original: 幸福なのは義務なんです
subtitles.english: It's a duty to be happy

subtitles.original: 幸福なのは義務なんです
subtitles.english: It's a duty to be happy

subtitles.original: 幸せですか？　義務ですよ
subtitles.english: Are you happy? It's a duty

subtitles.original: 幸福なのは義務なんです
subtitles.english: It's a duty to be happy

subtitles.original: 幸福なのは義務なんです
subtitles.english: It's a duty to be happy

subtitles.original: 幸福なのは義務なんです
subtitles.english: It's a duty to be happy

subtitles.original: 幸せですか？　義務ですよ
subtitles.english: Are you happy? It's a duty

subtitles.original: ですから、安心して義務を果たすように
subtitles.english: So, please fulfill your duty with peace of mind

subtitles.original: 皆様の幸せが　我々も幸せ
subtitles.english: Your happiness is our happiness too

subtitles.original: 幸せですか？　義務ですよ
subtitles.english: Are you happy? It's a duty

subtitles.original: 果たしてますか？
subtitles.english: Are you fulfilling it?

subtitles.original: 幸せじゃないなら……
subtitles.english: If you aren't happy...

subtitles.original: 絞首 斬首 銃殺 釜茹で 溺死 電気 火あぶり
subtitles.english: Hanging, beheading, shooting, boiling, drowning, electrocution, burning

subtitles.original: 埋め 薬殺 石打ち 鋸挽き 磔
subtitles.english: Burial, lethal injection, stoning, sawing, crucifixion

subtitles.original: 好きなの、選んでね
subtitles.english: Choose whichever you like

subtitles.original: ハイハイ！
subtitles.english: High, high!

subtitles.original: さぁさぁ皆さん　幸せだけが満ちてます
subtitles.english: Come now, everyone, only happiness fills the air

subtitles.original: 不安とか不満　何一つないでしょう？
subtitles.english: Anxiety or dissatisfaction, there's not a single thing, right?

subtitles.original: こわ、こわいわ　幸せすぎてこわいわ
subtitles.english: Scary, it's scary. It's so happy it's scary

subtitles.original: ほんとうに　みんなが幸せなの？
subtitles.english: Is everyone really happy?

subtitles.original: この世界の「外」へ
subtitles.english: To the "outside" of this world

subtitles.original: 行きたいって
subtitles.english: They say they want to go

subtitles.original: 逃げたいって
subtitles.english: They say they want to escape

subtitles.original: 水辺の公園で
subtitles.english: In the park by the water

subtitles.original: みんなが耳をふさいで
subtitles.english: Everyone covers their ears

subtitles.original: ビクビクしてた
subtitles.english: They were trembling

subtitles.original: ええ、オンディーヌね
subtitles.english: Yes, it's Undine

subtitles.original: ビクビクしてた
subtitles.english: They were trembling

subtitles.original: Ａ Ｏ Ｎ Ｄ Ｉ Ｉ Ｎ Ｅ
subtitles.english: A O N D I I N E

subtitles.original: ハイハイ！
subtitles.english: High, high!

subtitles.original: さぁさぁ皆さん　死にました
subtitles.english: Come now, everyone, they died

subtitles.original: オンディーヌを振った騎士は　死にました
subtitles.english: The knight who rejected Undine died

subtitles.original: 葬儀に出るなよ　向こうに並べ
subtitles.english: Don't go to the funeral, line up over there

subtitles.original: それ以外は幸せに暮らせ
subtitles.english: Otherwise, live happily

subtitles.original: 以上！
subtitles.english: That's all!
